section.name: Coordinate Accuracy
section.tip: Carefully observe element boundaries in the image
Ensure bounding boxes tightly fit the content
Double-check that x1 < x2 and y1 < y2
Verify coordinates are within image dimensions

section.name: Element Identification
section.tip: Look for visual cues like font size, weight, and spacing
Identify heading hierarchy based on visual prominence
Don't miss small elements like footnotes or page numbers

section.name: Reading Order
section.tip: Handle multi-column layouts by completing left column first
Place footers and footnotes after main content

section.name: Content Extraction
section.tip: Extract complete text including special characters
For images, provide meaningful descriptive text
Preserve formatting indicators like bullet points
Include URLs when visible in link elements

issue.solution: Ensure each element has distinct, non-overlapping boundaries
Always use x1 < x2 and y1 < y2
Scan entire image systematically, including margins
Follow visual flow and document structure conventions
